name: The Last Flame (Tortoise Games)
description:
The last flame before eternal darkness.... What will you do? save yourself? or savethe last light...   Made for ludum dare 46 game jam

The game has a lot of bugs, but oh well I had fun atleast.

Objective---

  • Protect the flame at all costs
  • Don't die
  • Survive till wave 5

Controls ---

  •    WASD to move
  • Mouse to rotatate weapon
  • Left mouse button attack
  • E to open shop (The buttons are buggy, so you have the click the name on the top)
  • Shift to dash 

This is my first ever game, and game jam that I've participated in. The game is made with godot game engine and for the art I've used aseprite. I have a lot to learn but I loved making this, and hope to participate in many other jams...

Feedback is apreciated:

                             I love giving and receiving feedback even though this is my first game and there are a lot of mistakes I want to get better!
